Phrases.SiteDescription: The eXHALeR web app is meant to help with your breathing excercises, and has been said to reduce stress and anxiety, by promoting slow and even breathing patterns.
Phrases.SettingsDescription: Use this breathing app to help with your yoga or meditation exercises. If you are suffering from anxiety or panic attacks, please visit the ADAA for more help and tips.
Phrases.SettingsShareJoin: Join us on Facebook to discuss more breathing patterns.
Phrases.SettingsShareEmbed: Want to embed the eXHALeR app into your website? Use this embed code and share it with your users.
